description: From Greek  εύζωνος (évzonos), from Ancient Greek εὔζωνος (eúzōnos, “girt for battle”), from εὖ (eû, “well”) + ζώνη (zṓnē, “girdle”).

nouns.description: evzone (plural evzones or evzonoi or evzoni)

entries.meaning: A member of the Greek presidential guard.
An infantryman of a select corps of the Greek army.
examples: The soldiers seen at various stations belong to the corps of the Greek army that proved itself most effective in the recent war, the Evzonoi.
